name: vscode-spring-boot
description: Provides validation and content assist for Spring Boot `application.properties`, `application.yml` properties files. As well as Boot-specific support for `.java` files.

commands.title: Manage Live Spring Boot Process Connections

boot-java.live-information.automatic-tra.description: Live Information - Automatic Process Tracking Enabled
Live Information - Automatic Process Tracking Delay in ms

boot-java.live-information.fetch-data.ma.description: Live Information - Max number of retries (before giving up)

boot-java.live-information.fetch-data.re.description: Live Information - Delay between retries in seconds

boot-java.scan-java-test-sources.on.description: Enable/Disable Java test sources files scanning

boot-java.support-spring-xml-config.on.description: Enable/Disable Support for Spring XML Config files

boot-java.support-spring-xml-config.hype.description: Enable/Disable Hyperlinks in Spring XML Config file editor

boot-java.support-spring-xml-config.cont.description: Enable/Disable Content Assist in Spring XML Config file editor

boot-java.highlight-codelens.on.description: Enable/Disable Spring running Boot application Code Lenses

boot-java.change-detection.on.description: Enable/Disable detecting changes of running Spring Boot applications

boot-java.remote-apps.description: Array of jmx urls pointing to remote spring boot applications to poll for live hover information. A typical url looks something like this: `service:jmx:rmi://localhost:9111/jndi/rmi://localhost:9111/jmxrmi`

spring-boot.ls.logfile.description: The path of a file to write language server logs. If not set or null, then logs are discarded.

spring-boot.ls.java.home.description: Override JAVA_HOME used for launching the spring-boot-language-server JVM process.

spring-boot.ls.java.heap.description: Max JVM heap value, passed via -Xmx argument when launching spring-boot-language-server JVM process.

spring-boot.ls.java.vmargs.description: Additional 'user defined' VM args to pass to the language server process.
